DECLARE @RecordCount INT SELECT @RecordCount = COUNT(SUPP_ID) FROM PIS_Supplier
SUPP_Name LIKE '%'+#WHERE_SUPP_Name#+'%'
SUPP_ShortName LIKE '%'+#WHERE_SUPP_ShortName#+'%'
SUPP_Code LIKE '%'+#WHERE_SUPP_Code#+'%'
SUPP_Contacter LIKE '%'+#WHERE_SUPP_Contacter#+'%'
SUPP_IsValid=#WHERE_SUPP_IsValid#
SELECT @RecordCount 'RecordCount', SUPP_ID , SUPP_Code , SUPP_Name , SUPP_ShortName , SUPP_Contacter , SUPP_Tel , SUPP_Phone , SUPP_QQ , SUPP_Territory , SUPP_Prov_Code , SUPP_City_Code , SUPP_Dist_Code , SUPP_Address , SUPP_EvaluateLevel , SUPP_LastEvaluateDate , SUPP_BankName , SUPP_BankAccountName , SUPP_BankAccountNo , SUPP_MainAutoParts , SUPP_Remark , SUPP_IsValid , SUPP_CreatedBy , SUPP_CreatedTime , SUPP_UpdatedBy , SUPP_UpdatedTime , SUPP_VersionNo , SUPP_TransID , T2.Prov_Name 'Prov_Name' , T3.City_Name 'City_Name' , T4.Dist_Name 'Dist_Name' FROM PIS_Supplier T1 LEFT JOIN SM_ChineseProvince T2 ON T2.Prov_Code = T1.SUPP_Prov_Code AND T2.Prov_IsValid = 1 LEFT JOIN SM_ProvinceCity T3 ON T3.City_Code = T1.SUPP_City_Code AND T3.City_IsValid = 1 LEFT JOIN SM_CityDistrict T4 ON T4.Dist_Code = T1.SUPP_Dist_Code AND T4.Dist_IsValid = 1
SUPP_Name LIKE '%'+#WHERE_SUPP_Name#+'%'
SUPP_ShortName LIKE '%'+#WHERE_SUPP_ShortName#+'%'
SUPP_Code LIKE '%'+#WHERE_SUPP_Code#+'%'
SUPP_Contacter LIKE '%'+#WHERE_SUPP_Contacter#+'%'
SUPP_IsValid=#WHERE_SUPP_IsValid#
ORDER BY SUPP_UpdatedTime DESC
OFFSET ( #PageIndex# - 1 ) * #PageSize# ROWS FETCH NEXT #PageSize# ROWS ONLY

SELECT T2.SUPP_Name FROM BS_AutoPartsArchive T1 INNER JOIN PIS_Supplier T2 ON T2.SUPP_ID = T1.APA_SUPP_ID WHERE APA_SUPP_ID IS NOT NULL AND APA_SUPP_ID != '' AND #WHERE_SUPP_ID# LIKE '%' + T1.APA_SUPP_ID + ';%' AND APA_IsValid = 1 UNION SELECT T2.SUPP_Name FROM PIS_Inventory T1 INNER JOIN PIS_Supplier T2 ON T2.SUPP_ID = T1.INV_SUPP_ID WHERE INV_SUPP_ID IS NOT NULL AND INV_SUPP_ID != '' AND #WHERE_SUPP_ID# LIKE '%' + T1.INV_SUPP_ID + ';%' AND INV_IsValid = 1 UNION SELECT T2.SUPP_Name FROM PIS_PurchaseForecastOrder T1 INNER JOIN PIS_Supplier T2 ON T2.SUPP_ID = T1.PFO_SUPP_ID WHERE PFO_Org_ID IS NOT NULL AND PFO_Org_ID != '' AND #WHERE_SUPP_ID# LIKE '%' + T1.PFO_SUPP_ID + ';%' AND PFO_IsValid = 1 UNION SELECT T2.SUPP_Name FROM PIS_PurchaseOrder T1 INNER JOIN PIS_Supplier T2 ON T2.SUPP_ID = T1.PO_SUPP_ID WHERE PO_SUPP_ID IS NOT NULL AND PO_SUPP_ID != '' AND #WHERE_SUPP_ID# LIKE '%' + T1.PO_SUPP_ID + ';%' AND PO_IsValid = 1 UNION SELECT T2.SUPP_Name FROM PIS_ShareInventory T1 INNER JOIN PIS_Supplier T2 ON T2.SUPP_ID = T1.SI_SUPP_ID WHERE SI_WH_ID IS NOT NULL AND SI_SUPP_ID != '' AND #WHERE_SUPP_ID# LIKE '%' + T1.SI_SUPP_ID + ';%' AND SI_IsValid = 1 UNION SELECT T2.SUPP_Name FROM PIS_StockInDetail T1 INNER JOIN PIS_Supplier T2 ON T2.SUPP_ID = T1.SID_SUPP_ID WHERE SID_SUPP_ID IS NOT NULL AND SID_SUPP_ID != '' AND #WHERE_SUPP_ID# LIKE '%' + T1.SID_SUPP_ID + ';%' AND SID_IsValid = 1 UNION SELECT T2.SUPP_Name FROM PIS_TransferBillDetail T1 INNER JOIN PIS_Supplier T2 ON T2.SUPP_ID = T1.TBD_SUPP_ID WHERE TBD_SUPP_ID IS NOT NULL AND TBD_SUPP_ID != '' AND #WHERE_SUPP_ID# LIKE '%' + T1.TBD_SUPP_ID + ';%' AND TBD_IsValid = 1
